name: Malaysian-style Barbecue Pork Belly (Char Siu Pork) Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: pork belly, crushed garlic, honey, cooking wine, soy sauce, oyster sauce, five spice, black pepper, sugar, preserved tofu
recipeIngredient: 2 pieces preserved tofu (optional, available in local Asian supermarkets)
recipeInstructionSteps: Place the pork in a bowl along with all the marinade ingredients. Combine and leave to marinade for 6-8 hours.
Place the pork belly on a grill tray.
Roast the pork belly in the oven for 20 minutes, turning halfway through.
